title: @Meddler Is Orianna going to receive any changes with the mages update?
body: I think Orianna is a very balanced champ now, however, I think her viability has fallen a bit with all these AD buffs over the board and of course the lack of counter itemization for aps against this meta. She passed from a "standard pick, you can pick her anytime and be K" to "Only pick her if the match up is not that bad, if you have a good frontline and there are not so many divers on the enemy team". I think a small buff to her somewhere would be nice (Q speed faster?), however maybe AP items buffs or changes would be enough to put her where she was before. Maybe it is just me that feels this way about Ori, but she feels a bit weaker than before.
